title: Fireteam Chat Ep. 39 - Microtransactions and Simulants - IGN's Destiny Show
text: Previous FIRETEAM CHAT EP. 39 - MICROTRANSACTIONS AND SIMULANTS - IGN'S DESTINY SHOW â†’ 09 OCT 2015 This week the crew is back discussing the Sleeper Simulant questline, how Nightfall missions should be fixed and addressing their concerns with microtransactions.
